vscode.name: Prettier
vscode.description: Prettier is a Code Formatter that help you to organize your code,and it Support a lot of Programming Languages.

vscode.name: Better Comments
vscode.description: Better comments is nice VS Code Extension that allow you to Write Nice and beautifull comments.

vscode.name: Auto Close Tag
vscode.description: When you work with HTML you may forget to close tag, This VS Code Extension is Nice for You.

vscode.name: Indent Rainbow
vscode.description: If you work with a lot of lines of code, you may make a mistake like forget opening and closing tags or other mistakes, But with this extansion you will not make this mistake again.

vscode.name: JEST
vscode.description: If You use JEST Framework in Your Testing Process, This is nice extension for You, Jest EXtension giev you testing result withour run testing task in yoru Terminal.

vscode.name: Live Server
vscode.description: Live Server is the Most famous VS Code Extensions that let you to run locla server in your Machine to see changes Immediately.

vscode.name: Material Icon Theme
vscode.description: Nice Extension that give You nice and beatiful files icons, like javascript, python...etc, Material Icon Theme Extension supports Folders Icon too.

vscode.name: Path Intellisense
vscode.description: Excellent Extension that help you to handle paths in your imports, Autocomplete Filenames and more

vscode.name: Simple React Snippets
vscode.description: If You are React Developer this Extansion is an important to you, It helps you to create Big code by some Shortcuts which ease your development Process.

vscode.name: Tailwind CSS IntelliSense
vscode.description: Nice Extension that help you if you are use Tailwind CSS Developer, It help you by suggest tailwind properties during your Work.

vscode.name: Turbo Console Log
vscode.description: This Extension help you when you want to log some data in Console, It log data in console with some extra information like line, variable's name and more.

vscode.name: Tokyo Night
vscode.description: Nice Theme that I start Using in VS Code Editor, It have nice colors and other Features.

vscode.name: Snapcode
vscode.description: Nice Extension that help you to take beatiful snapshot to specific piece of code.

vscode.name: Rainbow Tags
vscode.description: Nice VS Code Extension that colorize HTML Tags, which help you to know start and end of the Tag.

packages.name: joi
packages.description: Joi is and npm package that used to handle validation process for your forms, it contains alot of awesome methods and properties that let you to validate your forms by easy way.

packages.name: SWR
packages.description: SWR is an React hook that give you all you need to fetch data from APIs Endpoints and handle it in you Frontend Project, It isnot just as normal fetch library like axios of fetch, it give you alot of features like pagination, mutation and more

packages.name: JSON Server
packages.description: JSON Server is a VS Code Extension that let you to apply CRUD Operations like get, post, put, delete...etc on and locally data in your machine and it is usful if you are frontend developer and you want to test your fetching process.

packages.name: Axios
packages.description: Axios is the most library that used in fetching data from APIs process, is has a lot of features and properties that ease fetching process.

packages.name: Sweet Alert
packages.description: Normal alerts in JavaScript has a lot of problems like bloking code from excution and more problems, Sweet Alert coming to solve this problem, It give Us nice Alerts that not contains problems.

packages.name: React Toastify
packages.description: React Toastify is a NPM Package that give Us nice Toasts and with different shapes and colors like error, info, success and warning so if you are frontend developer you shoud try It.

packages.name: Formik
packages.description: Handling Forms is a difficult process that take a lot of time, Formik Library came to solve this problem, It give us a lot of hooks and functions that help us to handle events like submitting event.

websites.name: Fancy Border Rdaius Generator
websites.description: Awesome website to Create any CSS Border Radius shape shape by Easy way.
